basics.name: Roberto Santos Mazutti Kosmel
basics.label: Junior Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Junior Full-Stack developer focused on React/Next.js, Node.js (Express), and PostgreSQL. Hands-on experience with production deployment and operations on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3), with responsibility for end-to-end delivery and cloud operations.

work.name: Blue Exams / The Mindville / MBA No Brainer
work.summary: Worked across multiple web products with a strong focus on delivery, production stability, and cloud operations support.
highlights: Built and maintained web applications with end-to-end ownership (frontend, backend, database).
Created and consumed REST APIs (Next.js endpoints, Stripe, NextAuth, Chatwoot, Node.js backend).
Worked with PostgreSQL and Prisma/ORM flows, supporting maintenance and debugging routines.
Responsibility for deployment and operations on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3 + multiple services) and Linux/Nginx.

education.institution: Federal University of São Paulo (UNIFESP), São José dos Campos
Federal University of São Paulo (UNIFESP), São José dos Campos

projects.name: Blue Exams — Mock exam subscription platform
projects.description: Subscription-based web mock exam platform with authentication, billing, and dashboard.
highlights: Built core flows (login and dashboard) using Next.js/React.
Implemented authentication/access control (NextAuth) and subscription billing (Stripe).
Backed by PostgreSQL via Prisma, with ongoing production maintenance and fixes.

projects.name: Blue Exams — Landing page (marketing site)
projects.description: Static marketing site deployed on a Linux server.
highlights: Built in HTML/CSS/JavaScript and operated on AWS EC2 + Nginx with TLS/Let's Encrypt.

projects.name: Electric Ways — EV routing
projects.description: Academic project to generate routes considering driving range and charging stops.
highlights: Route modeling with range and charging constraints.
